name: nepchin
tag_list: buyers, sellers, ecommerce, marketing, post-your-need, what-do-you-need
overview:
About nepchin!

nepchin is a service that allows people to post what they need to buy!

If you are a business sign up to get free job notifications or sales leads!

The easiest way to think of nepchin is reverse search. Instead of you searching for products or services, you let the product/service providers search you!

Have the market come to you!

I like browsing when I have time and enjoy the experience. Window shopping can be quite relaxing and a fun social outing.

Today, I just donâ€™t have time!!!! I need it now! If youâ€™re like me and you need say a computer, how do you know where to go, whoâ€™s offering the best deal? Iâ€™m not an expert so how should I know where to look?! I went from shop to shop, comparing catalogues and had to keep repeating to everyone what I wanted.

It dawned upon me that it would be easier for everyone, if I could just tell them what I needed, how much and when I needed it just once! Not twice but just once!!! Just be able to record somewhere where everyone could all look and record all the offers they made. Then all I had to do was browse each offer and accept the best one!

So with that in mind, I thought up nepchin. A place where I could tell people what I need, they look at what I need and make an offer. I evaluate all the offers and accept the one that suits my needs the best!
